s=document.createDocumentFragment();i.setStart(s,0),s.appendChild(i.createContextualFragment(t)),r.insertBefore(s,o)}}async _littleBreath(){Date.now()-this.lastBreath>45&&(await this._requestAnimFrame(),this.lastBreath=Date.now())}async _requestAnimFrame(){return document.hidden?new Promise((e=>setTimeout(e))):new Promise((e=>requestAnimationFrame(e)))}static run(){const meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Bandwidth—The universal platform for global enterprise communications

meta.name: description
meta.content: Powered by a global network. Guided by unmatched expertise, so you can create exceptional experiences for customers worldwide.
Bandwidth—The universal platform for global enterprise communications
Powered by a global network. Guided by unmatched expertise, so you can create exceptional experiences for customers worldwide.

meta.name: twitter:title
meta.content: Bandwidth—The universal platform for global enterprise communications

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Powered by a global network. Guided by unmatched expertise, so you can create exceptional experiences for customers worldwide.

meta.script: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@graph":[{"@type":"Organization","@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#organization","name":"Bandwidth","url":"https://www.bandwidth.com/","sameAs":["https://www.facebook.com/bandwidth","https://www.linkedin.com/company/bandwidth-inc/","https://www.youtube.com/bandwidth","https://twitter.com/bandwidth"],"logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","inLanguage":"en-US","@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#/schema/logo/image/","url":"https://www.bandwidth.com/wp-content/uploads/bandwidth-logo.svg","contentUrl":"https://www.bandwidth.com/wp-content/uploads/bandwidth-logo.svg","width":"1024","height":"1024","caption":"Bandwidth"},"image":{"@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#/schema/logo/image/"}},{"@type":"WebSite","@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#website","url":"https://www.bandwidth.com/","name":"Bandwidth","description":"APIs for Voice, Messaging and 911","publisher":{"@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#organization"},"potentialAction":[{"@type":"SearchAction","target":{"@type":"EntryPoint","urlTemplate":"https://www.bandwidth.com/?s={search_term_string}"},"query-input":"required name=search_term_string"}],"inLanguage":"en-US"},{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#webpage","url":"https://www.bandwidth.com/","name":"Bandwidth—The universal platform for global enterprise communications","isPartOf":{"@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#website"},"about":{"@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#organization"},"datePublished":"2018-10-22T21:56:18+00:00","dateModified":"2022-05-04T18:04:51+00:00","description":"Powered by a global network. Guided by unmatched expertise, so you can create exceptional experiences for customers worldwide.","breadcrumb":{"@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#breadcrumb"},"inLanguage":"en-US","potentialAction":[{"@type":"ReadAction","target":["https://www.bandwidth.com/"]}]},{"@type":"BreadcrumbList","@id":"https://www.bandwidth.com/#breadcrumb","itemListElement":[{"@type":"ListItem","position":1,"name":"Home"}]}]}

a.span: Integration with Pindrop — a voice authentication integration for enterprise contact centers

li.class: wide nav-products menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-product menu-item-has-children menu-item-188653
no-flex menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-product menu-item-has-children menu-item-188687
nav-solutions menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-solution menu-item-has-children menu-item-188698
nav-solutions menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-solution menu-item-has-children menu-item-188702
nav-solutions menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-resource menu-item-has-children menu-item-191451
nav-solutions menu-item menu-item-type-post_type_archive menu-item-object-resource menu-item-has-children menu-item-188722
nav-solutions menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children menu-item-188717

div.h3: The universal platform for global enterprise communications
div.p: Bandwidth is the global cloud platform enterprises choose for cloud-ready voice, messaging, and emergency services.

img.alt: Universal platform, Global Reach, Trusted Experts

div.div: Customer engagements software and app builders
Our telco experts and cloud communication folks
IT leaders and future cloud movers

div.h2: Flexibility to create an integrated customer experience

p.p: Bandwidth is a communications platform with limitless flexibility. You need integrations, enterprise-class APIs, and tools to manage your communications stack intelligently. We are open where you need it the most, with optionality and control.

ul.li: Launch easily with an API library built to scale

lottie-player.alt: animation of Bandwidth dashboard with popping up text descriptions

div.p: Our global network is directly connected where it matters most. Giving unmatched reliability. Bringing your customers closer. Scaling wherever your business takes you.

div.div: countries where we are a national operator

div.h3: Our global network ensures unmatched quality, greater control, and better consistency.

p.p: You are expected to integrate tooling, automate operations, navigate regulatory requirements, and deliver a top-notch experience across channels and geographies. It’s no small feat.
Bandwidth is rooted in both telecom and real-world software expertise. Let us help you create experiences that set your business apart.

div.div: Simplify your enterprise contact center’s move to the cloud while gaining flexibility, scalability, and control.

div.h2:
Our parents think
we’re special, but don’t
take their word for it
div.p: Customers and analysts agree! Bandwidth continues to be ranked as a global communications leader.

blockquote.q: Partnering with Bandwidth means that setting up and delivering voice services is a fast, easy, and reliable process.
Without Bandwidth, we wouldn’t have been able to go worldwide so fast.

div.p: Co-founder and Director of Platform and Infrastructure

blockquote.q: Their flexible APIs made it simple for us to get up and running without missing a beat.

div.p: Co-Founder and Director of Software Development
Have a support question? Want to add SMS to your app? Need to talk to legal? Have a great minestrone soup recipe? Whatever the reason you need to chat, let us know and we'll give you a call.

p.a: Bandwidth.com CLEC, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Bandwidth Inc. &copy2022
Bandwidth.com CLEC, LLC is a wholly owned subsidiary of Bandwidth Inc. &copy2022

img.p: Help authenticate your callers with a carrier-level integration for Pindrop and your CCaaS platform—only from Bandwidth.

descriptor&&(descriptor.writable=!0),Object.defineProperty(target,descriptor.key,descriptor)}}return function(Constructor,protoProps,staticProps){return protoProps&&defineProperties(Constructor.prototype,protoProps),staticProps&&defineProperties(Constructor,staticProps),Constructor}}();function _classCallCheck(instance,Constructor){if(!(instance RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker(options){_classCallCheck(this,RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker),this.passiveSupported=!1,this._checkPassiveOption(this),this.options=!!this.passiveSupported&&options}return _createClass(RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker,[{key:"_checkPassiveOption",value:function(self){try{var options={get passive(){return!(self.passiveSupported=!0)}};window.addEventListener("test",null,options),window.removeEventListener("test",null,options)}catch(err){self.passiveSupported=!1}}},{key:"initRequestIdleCallback",value:function(){!1 in window&&(window.requestIdleCallback=function(cb){var start=Date.now();return setTimeout(function(){cb({didTimeout:!1,timeRemaining:function(){return Math.max(0,50-(Date.now()-start))}})},1)}),!1 in window&&(window.cancelIdleCallback=function(id){return clearTimeout(id)})}},{key:"isDataSaverModeOn",value:function(){return"connection"in navigator&&!0===navigator.connection.saveData}},{key:"supportsLinkPrefetch",value:function(){var elem=document.createElement("link");return elem.relList&&elem.relList.supports&&elem.relList.supports("prefetch")&&window.IntersectionObserver&&"isIntersecting"in IntersectionObserverEntry.prototype}},{key:"isSlowConnection",value:function(){return"connection"in navigator&&"effectiveType"in navigator.connection&&("2g"===navigator.connection.effectiveType||"slow-2g"===navigator.connection.effectiveType)}}]),RocketBrowserCompatibilityChecker}();
